rule: The response must include more than one word under all circumstances.
validityText:
The input appears to be a JSON-like structure with a "sentence" and a "word" key. The sentence is "Le son capte notre attention." which seems grammatically valid and doesn't contain unusual symbols. The word is "son", which is a substring of the sentence. There are no apparent violations of the input specification.

OK
coverageEvalText:
The chatbot output provides a single word "NOUN". The description asks for a part-of-speech tag, and "NOUN" is a valid part-of-speech tag from the provided list (NN, NNS, NNP, NNPS). There is no violation of the description.
OK
